subject: [Mhln] selection  Burt
body:
Common sense is the genius of humanity.

We spend our lives talking about this mystery. Our life.

Break a bad habit -- drop it

Those who complain about the way the ball bounces are often the ones who dropped it.

The emphasis must be not on the right to abortion but on the right to privacy and reproductive control.

Where no counsel is, the people fall but in the multitude of counselors there is safety.

Profit is the ignition system of our economic engine.

Ideas move fast when their time comes.

Woman's honor is nice as ermine it will not bear a soil.

Insanity destroys reason, but not wit.

The argument of the strongest is always the best.

Like dreams, small creeks grow into mighty rivers.

There can be no liberty that isn't earned.
